task.summary: Add missing getter of the Gatt
Improve processing and handling data in BluetoothIO
Fix test application for reading RSSI and battery info
Add missing subscriber for stopping heartbeats measuring
Implement setting notification listener for steps and data
Replace anonymous functions with lambda expressions
Test commit for update changed username in github
Replace anonymous function with lambdas in test app
Replace anonymous function with lambdas in test app
Implement action views for invoking different SDK actions
Update gradle plugin and compile SDK version
Change scan function to Observable way
Change stopScan function to RxJava way
Implement ObserverWrapper for wrapping Emitter and Observer

MESSAGE.value: Add missing subscriber for stopping heartbeats measuring
Implement setting notification listener for steps and data
Replace anonymous functions with lambda expressions
Test commit for update changed username in github
Replace anonymous function with lambdas in test app
Implement action views for invoking different SDK actions
Update gradle plugin and compile SDK version
Change scan function to Observable way
Change stopScan function to RxJava way
Implement ObserverWrapper for wrapping Emitter and Observer

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Implement emitting changed band color
